price: 89. Usun kol gacisak:Reeda inkih Yallih iimi axce-lon, toysa Yalla inkittossaanaah taqbudeenimik mannal daggawtaanaa makkottaanaa? kaak kalihim taqbudcn waqdi baab abcyni baab siinil abeh innah keenik ixxicx.

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
